example.name: autogen2
example.text: These days , Mr. Breeden is winning praise in Washington and on Wall Street for his behind-the-scenes role in monitoring the Friday-the-13th market plunge and the following Monday 's harrowing morning session .
example.arg: in Washington and on Wall Street
for his behind-the-scenes role in monitoring the Friday-the-13th market plunge and the following Monday 's harrowing morning session
